academies.title: Korean
academies.catchPhrase: Discover the beauty of Korean culture through language!
academies.improvement: Fluency in speaking, reading, and writing Korean.

academies.title: English
academies.catchPhrase: Master English and open up a world of opportunities!
academies.improvement: Enhanced speaking, listening, and writing skills.
academies.equipment: Notebook, pen, and English grammar book.

academies.title: Piano
academies.catchPhrase: Play your heart out with our piano classes!
academies.improvement: Piano playing skills, music theory knowledge.

academies.title: DIY (Do it Yourself)
academies.description: Create and craft your own projects
academies.catchPhrase: Craft your world with our DIY classes!
academies.improvement: Handicraft skills, creativity, and project planning.
academies.equipment: Craft supplies as needed per project.

academies.title: Kids
academies.description: Fun and educational activities for children
academies.catchPhrase: Learning through play for young minds!
academies.improvement: Cognitive and motor skills through fun activities.

academies.title: Pickleball
academies.description: Learn and enjoy the sport of pickleball

academies.title: Basketball
academies.catchPhrase: Shoot for the stars with basketball!
academies.improvement: Dribbling, shooting, and team play skills.

academies.title: Soccer
academies.catchPhrase: Kick your way to success with soccer!

academies.title: Stretch and Strengthen
academies.description: Dynamic, diverse, full-body workouts suitable for all fitness levels that simultaneously combine stretching and strengthening while engaging all 650 muscles. These classes will increase flexibility and mobility for a healthy, toned and pain-free body.

academies.title: Cooking
academies.description: Learn new recipes and cooking techniques
academies.catchPhrase: Cook up a storm with our culinary classes!
academies.improvement: Cooking skills, recipe knowledge, and kitchen confidence.
academies.equipment: Apron, chef's knife, and basic cooking utensils.
